strDesc: [us] has wounds that healed incorrectly, and is both easier to wound and takes longer to heal
[us]'s nose and throat are irritated, causing discomfort like an allergy.
[us] has catastrophic levels of radiation poisoning.

[us] has severe burns, causing skin to redden and blister.
[us] is crashing after a caffeine high.
[us]'s heart stopped, and will likely die soon.
[us] feels nauseous, and has uncontrollable bouts of vomiting and diarrhea.
[us]'s diarrhea and vomiting has worsened. [us]'s skin is starting to take on a bluish tint.
[us] has a concussion, and is somewhat disoriented.
[us] has Cutaneous Radiation Syndrome: Onset Phase.
[us]'s skin is starting to turn reddish, and is irritated.
[us] has Cutaneous Radiation Syndrome: Latent Phase.
[us]'s skin is reddening as if burned, and ulcers are forming.
[us]'s body is swelling, and their saliva is bubbling.
[us]'s stomach feels awful, and is having diarrhea.
[us] is experiencing general aches and malaise.
[us] has a fever and is aching all over.
[us] is experiencing general aches and malaise.
[us] has a liver disorder that will lead to jaundice.
[us]'s skin and eyes are an unnatural yellowish color.
[us] has severe stomach pains that seem to be getting worse every minute.
[us]'s stomach pain has become unbearable, making them collapse in a fit of shaking.
[us] died due to acute bleeding in the lungs.
[us] is under the influence of a strong sedative.
[us] has a strained back, and is limited in what they can carry.
[us] died of a severe traumatic brain injury.
Unique ID used for tracking CondOwners.
[us] feels in control of their destiny.
[us] has impositions and leeway in equal measure.
[us] wishes people would stop nagging them.
[us] has minor blood loss, affecting their activities somewhat.
[us] has lost a lot of blood, and will likely need hospital care soon.
[us] suffered organ failure due to heat stroke.
[us] feels like the center of attention.
[us] wishes someone would talk to them.
[us] is unburdened by what they're carrying.
[us] is carrying a moderate load, and their movement rate is slower. [us] also fatigues faster.
[us] is carrying a heavy load, and their movement rate is much slower. [us] also fatigues much faster.
[us] is carrying too much weight, and unable to move.
[us] feels like another face in the crowd.
[us] feels that family has their back.
[us] hasn't checked in with their family in some time.
[us]'s air pressure is effectively a vacuum.
[us]'s air pressure can cause critical hypoxia.
[us]'s air pressure is safe for humans.
[us]'s N2 partial pressure is normal for humans.
[us]'s O2 partial pressure is normal for humans.
[us]'s body is an assult on the senses.
[us]'s whole body is in an inflammatory, potentially fatal state.
[us] feels that romance might be imminent.
[us] has a twinkle in their eye.
[us]'s dreams are in sync with reality.
[us] feels like the world makes sense.
[us] has no poison in their system.
There are a few people in [us].
[us] has all the personal space they need.
[us] feels like they're a sardine in a can.
[us] has a normal level of radiation exposure.
[us] has an elevated level of radiation exposure.
[us] has a dangerous level of radiation exposure.
[us] has a life-threatening level of radiation exposure.
[us] has a lethal level of radiation exposure.
[us] will die of radiation exposure soon.
[us] is feeling stuffed, and can't eat any more.
[us] is sick from feeling too full.
[us] has a handle on their fear.
[us] feels they're doing the right thing.
[us] feels they aren't making good choices.
[us] is in their circadian activity period.
[us] is in their circadian resting period.
[us] feels there is a rational explanation for everything.
[us] is paranoid of unseen forces constantly.
[us] has split from the whole program.
[us] has an arresting fear of pain.
[us] is more determined to succeed than most.
[us] is significantly less fussy than most.
[us] is uninterested in seeking personal advancement.
[us] is more physically coordinated than most.
[us] is easier to frighten than most.
[us] shows significantly more care in their work than others.
[us] is more physically fit, and less easily tired than most.
[us] is uncomfortable making decisions, and prefers following others.
[us] is physically easier to harm than most.
[us] frequently over-consumes and indulges for pleasure.
[us] is significantly more fond of company than most.
[us] has a permanently lowered amount of circulating blood.
[us] has a permanently weakened immune system.
[us] has trouble falling and staying asleep.
[us] can eat almost anything without ill effects.
[us] delights in making others feel good.
[us] is skilled at leading and organizing people.
[us] is more likely to stick with their team during tough times than most.
[us] is freely intimate in their relations.
[us] digests food more quickly than most.
[us] digests food more slowly than most.
[us] is completely unaware of their surroundings and details.
[us] is able to notice details better than most.
[us] sees the silver lining in everything.
[us] is willing to wait longer than most without being upset.
[us] rarely stands up for themeselves or their beliefs.
[us] is more likely to give up than most when challenged.
[us] is ready for crew to check on it.
[us] is significantly more likely to serve themselves before others.
[us] is significantly more likely to serve others before themselves.
[us] can hear things most others do not.
[us] is uncomfortable around other people, especially strangers.
[us] is physically stronger than most people.
[us] is unlikely to change their mind, even if proven wrong.
[us] is unlikely to indulge in pleasure for pleasure's sake.
[us] has a hard time not cleaning up a mess, especially their own.
[us] can take more of a beating than most.
[us] harbors no loyalty except to themselves.
[us] has little fear of placing their faith in others.
[us] is tired more easily by exertion than most.
[us] has trouble eating anything but the most tepid foods.
[us] is a simple condition, such as 'IsRed'.
